about.title: About SignGPT
about.description: Learn more about SignGPT and our mission

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: SignGPT is an AI-powered platform designed to bridge communication gaps by providing real-time sign language translation. We believe in making communication accessible to everyone, regardless of hearing ability.

features.title: Key Features
features.realTime: Real-time sign language recognition and translation
features.aiPowered: Cutting-edge AI models for accurate translation
features.multiPlatform: Available on desktop and mobile devices

technology.title: Technology
technology.content: SignGPT uses advanced machine learning models and computer vision to recognize sign language gestures and translate them into spoken language. Our models are trained on diverse datasets to ensure accuracy across different signing styles.

team.title: Team
team.content: SignGPT is developed by a passionate team of researchers, developers, and accessibility advocates who are committed to making communication more inclusive.

contribute.title: Get Involved
contribute.content: SignGPT is an open-source project. We welcome contributions from developers, researchers, and the deaf and hard-of-hearing community.
